text: Jan Gerrit Henry Krajenbrink (16 July 1941 - 29 June 2020) was a Dutch politician. He was a member of the Anti-Revolutionary Party and Christian Democratic Appeal. From 1981 to 1994, he was a member of the House of Representatives. From 1994 to 2002, Krajenbrink was Mayor of Woudenberg. He was born in Oostwold, Netherlands. Krajenbrink died on 29 June 2020 at the age of 78.Oud-CDA-Tweede Kamerlid Jan Krajenbrink overleden, parlement.com, 2 July 2020 ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Christian Democratic Appeal politicians Category:Dutch Calvinists Category:Dutch mayors Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Politicians from Groningen (province)
title: Jan Krajenbrink
